documents.text:

Our privacy policy outlines what kind of information we collect from you and how we will use it.
  1. DNA Painter
  2. Privacy Policy
Privacy Policy

Your privacy is very important to us. Accordingly, we have developed this Policy in order for you to understand how we collect, use, communicate and disclose and make use of personal information. The following outlines our privacy policy.

  • We ask for your name when you register an account but if you would rather not use your real name, that's fine.
  • You will need to use a genuine email address in order to verify your account. This is a security measure to prevent spam signups.
  • Your profiles cannot be viewed by any other user unless you explicitly share them by going into each profile, clicking the 'Share' icon and clicking the switch to mark the profile as shared. If you do this, your profile will be visible to (but not editable by) anyone with whom you share the profile URL.
  • By default, profiles are private and are only visible to you when you log into the site.
  • DNA Painter does not store your raw DNA data itself - just the match segments that you choose to enter yourself.
  • Other than the data you personally elect to enter yourself, the following data is collected:
    • Your IP address is stored with a timestamp whenever you log in and log out, and whenever you create or delete a DNA Profile. This helps identify the typical level of activities, which in turns helps to figure out which features are more popular. The IP address is stored to help safeguard your account.
  • Our aim is to provide a service that's useful to the genetic genealogy community and we will never make any other use of your data or sell your information to any third party.
  • We will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfillment of this service. If you wish to delete the information you've entered, you can do this yourself via the Profiles page. If you'd like to delete your account completely, please email info@dnapainter.com
  • We will protect your information by reasonable security safeguards against loss or theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. All communication with the server is encrypted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) aka HTTPS.
  • Any updates to our policies and practices relating to the management of personal information will appear on this page.

We are committed to conducting our business in accordance with these principles in order to ensure that the confidentiality of personal information is protected and maintained.

Cookies

This site uses the following cookies. Your use of this site indicates your consent for us to place these cookies on your computer. If you do not consent to receive these cookies, please disable cookies in your browser for this site.

  • __cfduid (1 year) - This is a cookie set by Cloudflare, who host the JavaScript library we use on the site
  • _ga (2 years) - This is a cookie set by Google Analytics, a service we use to track visitor numbers and activity, to distinguish users
  • _gat (1 minute) - This is a cookie set by Google Analytics to limit requests to their service
  • _gid (24 hours) - This is a cookie set by Google Analytics to distinguish users
  • uf4 (the duration of your visit) - This is a cookie used by our application to help us serve the correct content
Terms and Conditions · Privacy Policy © DNA Painter, 2021. Please email feedback to info@dnapainter.com. Please do not email your raw DNA!

Our legal policy applies to your usage of this website and our services.

Web Site Terms and Conditions of Use 1. Terms

By accessing this web site, you are agreeing to be bound by these web site Terms and Conditions of Use, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this web site are protected by applicable copyright and trade mark law.

2. Use License

Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on DNA Painter's web site for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

  • modify or copy the materials;
  • use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial)
    [note - if you want to include screenshots on your own site, that's fine. please email me at info@dnapainter.com to let me know];
  • attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on DNA Painter's web site;
  • remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials. or
  • transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server.

This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by DNA Painter at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.

3. Disclaimer

The materials on DNA Painter's web site are provided "as is". DNA Painter makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties, including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights. Further, DNA Painter does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its Internet web site or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.

4. Limitations

In no event shall DNA Painter or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption,) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on DNA Painter's Internet site, even if DNA Painter or a DNA Painter authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

5. Revisions and Errata

The materials appearing on DNA Painter's web site could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. DNA Painter does not warrant that any of the materials on its web site are accurate, complete, or current. DNA Painter may make changes to the materials contained on its web site at any time without notice. DNA Painter does not, however, make any commitment to update the materials.

6. Links

DNA Painter has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its Internet web site and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by DNA Painter of the site. Use of any such linked web site is at the user's own risk.

7. Site Terms of Use Modifications

DNA Painter may revise these terms of use for its web site at any time without notice. By using this web site you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these Terms and Conditions of Use.

8. Governing Law

Any claim relating to DNA Painter's web site shall be governed by the laws of the United Kingdom without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
